executable.title: antsRegistrationCLI
executable.description: This is a CLI module that can be bundled in an extension
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NIH grant NXNNXXNNNNNN-NNXN

string.name: antsCommand
string.label: ANTs Registration Command
string.description: specify the antsRegistration command without the output argument

transform.name: outputCompositeTransform
transform.label: Output Composite Transform
transform.description: Output composite transform. If using composite transform don't specify a displacement field

transform.name: outputDisplacementField
transform.label: Output Displacement Field
transform.description: Output displacement field. If using displacement field don't specify a composite transform
